title: Admin member-creation success UX for simulated onboarding communication logs

requirements.summary: Update the Add Member success experience to present Email/SMS/WhatsApp outputs as simulated in-app communication logs (not real delivery) while preserving copy-to-clipboard for credentials and message content.
acceptanceCriteria: After successfully creating a member via the existing Add Member dialog in `frontend/src/components/admin/MemberManagement.tsx`, the success dialog renders the returned `communicationLogs` and clearly labels them as simulation/not delivered (English text).

`frontend/src/components/admin/CommunicationSimulation.tsx` displays channel, timestamp, and message content as it does today, but the status label does not imply real delivery (e.g., it must not show “Sent” as a real-world outcome).
The UI continues to provide copy-to-clipboard for the email and password and does not regress existing member creation functionality.
Any user-facing explanatory text is in English.

file_operations.description: Adjust the post-create success dialog UX so it explicitly frames returned Email/SMS/WhatsApp items as simulated in-app logs (not real notifications) and continues to render the `ManualCreateMemberResponse` via the existing `CommunicationSimulation` view.

Update communication log status rendering so it never implies real-world delivery (e.g., replace any "sent"/"Sent" wording with an explicit simulated label), and ensure channel/timestamp/content presentation remains intact with copy-to-clipboard preserved.

requirements.summary: Add a prominent, consistent disclaimer anywhere the app shows Email/SMS/WhatsApp notification-like items that these are simulated in-app logs and are not delivered to real devices in this build.
acceptanceCriteria: At least one prominent disclaimer is shown in the admin communication log/simulation UI explaining that SMS/WhatsApp/Email delivery to real devices is not supported and what the admin should do instead (e.g., copy and share manually).
The disclaimer is visible without needing to inspect console logs and is written in English.
No immutable frontend paths are modified.

file_operations.description: Create a small admin-only disclaimer component that renders prominent English text explaining Email/SMS/WhatsApp are simulated in-app logs and will not be delivered; include guidance to copy/share manually.
Wire the new `CommunicationDisclaimer` into the communication simulation/log section so the disclaimer is prominently visible alongside the Email/SMS/WhatsApp log previews.
